RECEIVE_CUSTOMER_CONTACT_ID = #{receiverCustContactId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

CREATE_USER_DEPT_NAME = #{createUserDeptName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where WAYBILL_NO = #{waybillNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and ACTIVE = 'Y'
